documentation.text: @notice makes incremental adjustment to control variable
@notice reduce total debt

@notice determine maximum bond size
  @return uint

@notice calculate current bond premium
  @return price_ uint

@notice calculate current bond price and remove floor if above
  @return price_ uint

@notice converts bond price to DAI value
  @return price_ uint

@notice calculate current ratio of debt to Utop supply
  @return debtRatio_ uint

@notice debt ratio in same terms for reserve or liquidity bonds
  @return uint

@notice calculate debt factoring in decay
  @return uint

@notice amount to decay total debt by
  @return decay_ uint

@notice allow anyone to send lost tokens (excluding principle or Utop) to the DAO
  @return bool
